1.0.name: wordpress/follow-us-box
1.0.description:
This plugin will install a frontend widget containing: a Twitter follow button, a Facebook like box and a Google Plus box. You can also set the display order for these social media buttons.

Google+ box features:

  • enable/disable google+ box
  • google box width
  • google widget style

Twitter follow button features:

  • enable/disable twitter button
  • follow button size
  • show/hide count

Facebook like box features:

  • enable/disable facebook box
  • facebook widget width
  • facebook widget height
  • show/hide faces
  • show/hide stream

Related Links:

  • Follow Us Box Support
